sn55.44:3.1: 44. Paṭhamamahaddhanasutta
sn55.44:4.1: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako ‘aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo’ti vuccati.
sn55.44:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.44:5.7: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.44:5.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako ‘aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo’ti vuccatī”ti.
